attr.title: Fallout 1
attr.desc: Fallout is a post-nuclear RPG. The Vault Dweller is tasked with exploring post-nuclear California in order to retrieve a water chip to replace the broken chip of Vault 13, their home. The player will engage in character building and turn-based tactical combat while exploring the post-apocalyptic wasteland.
attr.desc_md:
**Fallout: A Post Nuclear Role Playing Game** is a classic post-apocalyptic role-playing game from 1997.

The Vault Dweller is tasked with exploring post-nuclear California in order to retrieve a water chip to replace the broken chip of Vault 13, their home, which they are the first person to ever leave. The player will engage in Western RPG character building and turn-based tactical combat while getting to know settlements and factions of people, mutants and ghouls through branching dialogue trees.
attr.inst: You need to copy critter.dat, master.dat and data from the original game to ports/fallout1 folder.
attr.inst_md:
You need to copy `critter.dat`, `master.dat` and `data` directory from the original game to `ports/fallout1` folder.

The game can be purchased from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/38400/) or [GOG](https://www.gog.com/game/fallout).
